Wisdom: لَا يَصْدُرُ عَنِ الْقَلْبِ السَّلِيمِ إِلَّا الْمَعْنَى الْمُسْتَقِيمُ
enWisdom: Nothing comes forth from a sound heart except the direct meaning

Wisdom: إِذَا أَحَبَّ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عَبْداً رَزَقَهُ قَلْباً سَلِيماً وَخُلُقاً قَوِيماً
enWisdom: When Allah loves a servant, He bestows him with a good heart and an upright character

Wisdom: أَشْعِرْ قَلْبَكَ الرَّحْمَةَ لِجَمِيعِ النَّاسِ وَالْإِحْسَانَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تُنِلْهُمْ حَيْفاً وَلَا تَكُنْ عَلَيْهِمْ سَيْفاً [سَفِيهاً]
enWisdom: Imbibe your heart with mercy for all the people and kindness towards them, and do not oppress them or be [like] a sword over them

Wisdom: أَحْيِ قَلْبَكَ بِالْمَوْعِظَةِ وَأَمِتْهُ بِالزَّهَادَةِ وَقَوِّهِ بِالْيَقِينِ وَذَلِّلْهُ بِذِكْرِ الْمَوْتِ وَقَرِّرْهُ بِالْفَنَاءِ وَبَصِّرْهُ فَجَائِعَ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Enliven your heart with exhortations and kill it with asceticism, strengthen it with certitude and humble it with the remembrance of death, make it see the transience of this life and show it the calamities of the world
The best of hearts is a heart that has been filled with understanding

Wisdom: إِنَّ هَذِهِ الْقُلُوبَ أَوْعِيَةٌ فَخَيْرُهَا أَوْعَاهَا لِلْخَيْرِ
enWisdom: Verily these hearts are receptacles, and the best of them are those that are most receptive to good

Wisdom: إِنَّ النَّاظِرَ بِالْقَلْبِ الْعَامِلَ بِالْبَصَرِ يَكُونُ مُبْتَدَأَ عَمَلِهِ أَنْ يَنْظُرَ عَمَلَهُ عَلَيْهِ أَمْ لَهُ فَإِنْ كَانَ لَهُ مَضَى فِيهِ وَإِنْ كَانَ عَلَيْهِ وَقَفَ عَنْهُ
enWisdom: Verily the one who observes with his heart and acts with foresight begins his action by first looking at [the consequence of] his action, is it his favour or against him; if it is in his favour then he goes ahead with it and if it is against him then he holds back from [doing] it

Wisdom: بَيَانُ الرَّجُلِ يُنْبِئُ عَنْ قُوَّةِ جَنَانِهِ
enWisdom: The elocution of a man apprises of the strength of his heart
Sadness of the hearts purges the sins

Wisdom: ذَلِّلْ قَلْبَكَ بِالْيَقِينِ وَقَرِّرْهُ بِالْفَنَاءِ وَبَصِّرْهُ فَجَائِعَ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Humble your heart with certitude, make it acknowledge the transience of this life, and make it see the calamities of this world

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ خَلَا مِنَ الْغِلِّ صَدْرُهُ وَسَلِمَ مِنَ الْغِشِّ قَلْبُهُ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one whose chest is void of rancour and whose heart is safe from deception

Wisdom: طَهِّرُوا قُلُوبَكُمْ مِنْ دَرَنِ السَّيِّئَاتِ تُضَاعَفْ لَكُمُ الْحَسَنَاتُ
enWisdom: Purify your hearts from the filth of evil deeds and your good deeds will be multiplied

Wisdom: قُلُوبُ الْعِبَادِ الطَّاهِرَةُ مَوَاضِعُ نَظَرِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ فَمَنْ طَهَّرَ قَلْبَهُ نَظَرَ إِلَيْهِ
enWisdom: The pure hearts of the servants are places that Allah, the Glorified, looks upon [with His mercy]; so whoever purifies his heart, He will look upon it

Wisdom: لِيَخْشَعْ لِلَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ قَلْبُكَ فَمَنْ خَشَعَ قَلْبُهُ خَشَعَتْ جَمِيعُ جَوَارِحِهِ
enWisdom: Your heart must submit to Allah, the Glorified, for one whose heart submits, all the other parts of his body also submit

Wisdom: مَنْ عَرَّى مِنَ الشَّرِّ قَلْبَهُ سَلِمَ لَهُ دِينُهُ وَصَدَقَ يَقِينُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever strips his heart of evil, his religion is secured and his conviction is confirmed
